survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Sustainable Packaging in Food Delivery
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and willingness to pay for sustainable packaging options in food delivery services.

questions.question_text: How often do you order food for delivery in a typical week?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clear responses. Ensure the options cover a broad range of frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you order food for delivery in a typical week?

questions.question_text: Which types of sustainable packaging are you most familiar with? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: I am not familiar with any of these
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes to allow multiple selections. Include an option for those unfamiliar with the topic.

script.question_text: Which types of sustainable packaging are you most familiar with? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: I am not familiar with any of these

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a small additional fee (e.g., $0.50-$1.00) for sustainable packaging options?
answer_options: Yes, but only if the fee is minimal ($0.50 or less)
No, I would not pay extra
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. Offer a range of responses to capture nuanced opinions.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a small additional fee (e.g., $0.50-$1.00) for sustainable packaging options?
answer_options: Yes, but only if the fee is minimal ($0.50 or less)
No, I would not pay extra

questions.question_text: What factors would most influence your decision to choose sustainable packaging for food delivery? (Select up to 2)
answer_options: Brand reputation of the delivery service
Availability of the option at checkout
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes with a limit of 2 selections to prioritize key factors.
